title: Can't Log-in, no loading screen?
body:
Well...

I am testing the Alpha Client on LAN and had updated it today. I had logged on it with my username and password, played around for a bit with the buttons, and queued for a... minute or two on Draft Queue, however I had decided to just close the client because It was going to take too long (Well, It isn't like the server is _too_ populated at 8:00 A.M., I suppose)

*ahem* 

Anyways, about one hour later, I had tried to use the client. Regretfully, I couldn't. 

The usual loading screen didn't show up, and clicking doesn't seem to work on any part but the minimize/settings & about screen/quit buttons, which are fully functional. I can't click on the Username & Password fields, nor the region/language (Wasn't planning on changing it anyway :-|)

So far I've tried Signing off on my computer and signing on again, Running the Alpha Client as Admin, and neither of those have worked. I might test with restarting the PC But I am not sure It'll work :x.

(That's it, lol)

EDIT: It seems to be working again, going to try a few games and see how it behaves.

replies.body: We have a fix for this, it should be included in the next patch, thanks.
Have you tried logging on to the AIR client?
Yes, the AIR Client does work like usual. :o

the same for me (pbe alpha). Happened just after last update.
EUW alpha works fine.

Same thing happened to me right now, after updating the client, I closed it and then reopened it and can't make it work in any way right now

I'll try restarting the pc as well
I am on EUW, and I have the same issue (still). I can't even change my region. None of the buttons on the right are working.
